text: Uye ndiani anodzvinyirira zvakanyanya kudarika uyo anorambidza kuti zita raAllah rirumbidzwe nokutaurwa zvakanyanya (mumunamato nezvikumbiro) mumaMasjid (dzimba dzokunamatira dza Allah), uye anoshingirira mukuparadzwa kwadzo? Zvakanga zvisina kukodzera kuti vave vanopinda maari (maMasjid aAllah) kunze kwekunge vachitya. Kwavari inyadzi pano pasi uye vachave nechirango chikuru muhupenyu hunotevera
